case_name: Bob Jones University v. United States
advocate_description_0: Pro se, by invitation of the Court, argued the cause as amicus curiae urging affirmance
advocate_description_1: Argued the cause for the petitioner, Bob Jones University

advocate_description_3: Argued the cause for the United States in both cases
